link.description: The web page's url to visit and retrieve content from

ur.description: a clear statement of the user's request, can be used as a search query and may include search operators.

l.description: the language used by the user in the request, according to the ISO 639-1 standard. For Chinese, use zh-CN for Simplified Chinese and zh-TW for Traditional Chinese

it.description: Information extraction types: news, table, profile, commodity, prices....

lp.description: Whether the link is directly provided by the user

rt.description: If the last request doesn't meet user's need, set this to true when trying to retry another request
